amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the National Environmental Policy Act waivers in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 113-339 to strike the National Environmental Policy Act waivers in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 237 (Roll no. 38).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 237 (Roll no. 38).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
